summary: A lonely and bitter young heiress - jealous of her cousin's engagement to another woman - becomes dangerously obsessed with legends surrounding a vampire ancestor, who supposedly murdered the young brides of the man she loved.
cast: Mel Ferrer|Elsa Martinelli|Annette Stroyberg|Alberto Bonucci|René-Jean Chauffard|Gabriella Farinon|Serge Marquand|Edith Peters|Nathalie Lafaurie|Carmilla Stroyberg|Marc Allégret|Giovanni Di Benedetto|Renato Speziali|Roger Vadim
title: Sangre y rosas
